mapper.sql: STUDENT_CODE_, NAME_, SEX_, FORM_LEARNING_, IS_OVERSEAS_, TRAINING_LEVEL_, FACULTY_, PROFESSION_, GRADE_, SPCIAL_PLAN_, REGISTRATION_STATUS_, ENROL_SEASON_, CAMPUS_, TRAINING_CATEGORY_, DEGREE_CATEGORY_,RESEARCH_DIRECTION_,STUDENT_CATEGORY_
mapper.select:
SELECT t2.STUDENT_CODE_, t2.NAME_, t2.TRAINING_LEVEL_, t2.STUDENT_CATEGORY_, t2.FACULTY_, t2.PROFESSION_, t2.RESEARCH_DIRECTION_ FROM elc_affinity_courses_stds_t t1 INNER JOIN student_t t2 ON (t1.STUDENT_ID_ = t2.STUDENT_CODE_)
t1.COURSE_CODE_ =#{courseCode}
and t2.STUDENT_CODE_ like concat('%',#{studentCode},'%')
and t2.NAME_ like concat('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT t1.STUDENT_CODE_, t1.NAME_, t1.TRAINING_LEVEL_, t1.STUDENT_CATEGORY_, t1.FACULTY_, t1.PROFESSION_, t1.RESEARCH_DIRECTION_ FROM student_t t1 WHERE STUDENT_CODE_ NOT IN ( SELECT STUDENT_ID_ FROM elc_affinity_courses_stds_t where COURSE_CODE_ =#{courseCode} )
and t1.STUDENT_CODE_ like concat('%',#{studentCode},'%')
and t1.NAME_ like concat('%',#{name},'%')

select
from student_t t1 join election_rounds_stu_t t2 on t2.STUDENT_ID_=t1.STUDENT_CODE_ WHERE t2.STUDENT_ID_=#{studentId} and t2.ROUNDS_ID_=#{roundId}

select
from student_t t1 JOIN elc_loser_stds_t t2 on t1.STUDENT_CODE_=t2.STUDENT_ID_ where t2.CALENDAR_ID_ = (select CALENDAR_ID_ from election_rounds_t WHERE ID_=#{roundId}) and t1.STUDENT_CODE_=#{studentId}
